item.title: California bans most law enforcement officers from wearing masks during operations
item.description: California became the first state to ban most law enforcement officers, including federal immigration agents, from covering their faces while conducting official business.

item.title: One man is dead after driving into a utility pole
item.description: The Florida Highway Patrol said a 31-year-old man drove his pickup truck into a utility pole in Charlotte County.

item.title: Woman shoots man at hotel after he refused to pay for sex, authorities say
item.description: Authorities say an arranged meeting at a hotel led to a shooting in downtown Myrtle Beach.

item.title: Mother of 9-year-old sues makers of Roblox, Fortnite, Minecraft over ‘addictive’ features
item.description: The lawsuit claims the video games’ makers added features they knew would be addictive without implementing safety features.

item.title: 63-year-old man hit, killed in Nokomis crash
item.description: The 63-year-old man was pronounced dead on the scene.

item.title: 1 dead and ‘several’ wounded in New Hampshire country club shooting; suspect in custody
item.description: Authorities say a gunman opened fire in a New Hampshire country club, killing one person and wounding “several other” people.

item.title: Mother pregnant with twins jumps from second-floor window to escape burning home
item.description: A mother who is 7 months pregnant with twins faced a difficult choice after a fire at her home trapped her upstairs.

item.title: Officials: Two children taken from Meigs found safe, two people arrested
item.description: The Thomas County Sheriff’s Office confirmed two children taken from Meigs were found safe.

item.title: Sunny and Dry for a Sunday Replay
item.description: Rain chances are low with drier air in the upper atmosphere
